General.Name: Reliance Home Finance Limited
General.Description: Reliance Home Finance Limited engages in the housing finance business in India. The company offers a range of loans, such as home and affordable housing loans, loans against properties, and construction finance loans. It also provides property services. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Mumbai, India.

7.Name: Mr. Darshan  Visaria
7.Title: Head of Talent Acquisition & Employee Relations
